name: Taru Pathak
college: Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University (AKTU)

education.school: Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University (AKTU)

projects.name: Funds4Good
projects.description: Developed a frontend for offering low/zero interest loans and charity money to those in need. Users can bookmark, view loan requests, apply with reasons, and validate recipients using identity proofs.

projects.name: BlogSphere
projects.description: Developed a fullstack blog website enabling users to read, create, and edit blogs with secure JWT token-based authentication. Utilized React Router for seamless navigation and provided RESTful APIs for efficient data management.

projects.name: Shopify
projects.description: Developed a fullstack shopping website with CRUD features, React Router DOM, JWT authentication, RESTful APIs, and MongoDB for data storage.

experiences.description: Developed a dashboard with Next.js and Tailwind CSS for creating organizations and WhatsApp-interacting agent bots, integrating chat bots. Built the main website for Tailor Talk.

Created an MVP dashboard where users can launch campaigns and ads similar to Meta campaigns using Next.js and Tailwind CSS, and designed the UI using Figma. Developed a second website for email warming using the Django MVT model.
Developed an e-commerce website for Tiles using React JS and also created the main website for LocalVille with the same technology.
Developed the SRL Life website interface using WordPress and Elementor, seamlessly integrating Figma for cohesive design.

experiences.role_name: Cloud Computing Cell Co-ordinator and FullStack Developer
experiences.description: Collaborating with a 45-member team to foster technical initiatives at the college and oversee diverse projects. Conducting diverse workshops on ReactJS and Python, providing instruction to over 150+ students.

full_output.name: Taru Pathak
achievements_and_awards: 4th Rank at CodeX24- a national level hackathon and Grand Finalist in a National level hackathon Paradigm.
Secured qualification in the internal hackathons of SIH 2023 and Kavach 2023, surpassing more than 100 college teams.
Solved 250+ problems across various platforms and completed streak of 100 DSA problems on LeetCode.
